scripts.prebuild:production: bun run build:client && bun run embed-static
scripts.build:production: bun run prebuild:production && bun run build
scripts.dev: cd client && bun run build:watch & bun run scripts/dev-watch.ts
scripts.compile: bun run build:production && bun build --compile --define 'process.env.NODE_ENV="production"' --target bun --outfile gowa-manager src/index.ts
scripts.compile:optimized: bun run build:production && bun build --compile --minify --bytecode --define 'process.env.NODE_ENV="production"' --target bun --outfile gowa-manager-opt src/index.ts
